lead_paragraph: Opponents of the bill, passed by the legislature and sent to Gov. Nathan Deal, called it discriminatory.

headline.print_headline: Georgia Bill Would Shield Opponents of Gay Marriage
headline.main: Georgia Measure Would Shield Opponents of Same-Sex Marriage

snippet: Opponents of the bill, passed by the legislature and sent to Gov. Nathan Deal, called it discriminatory.
abstract: Georgia General Assembly votes overwhelmingly to strengthen protections for opponents of same-sex marriage, handing victory to religious conservatives.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
